name: Terra Pulse
storyline:
Decades after a disaster that disabled most of the planet's electric artifacts and turned nature against civilization, humans are trying to get back on their feet, while keeping away from the cities now infested with mutated creatures. 
 
You are an artifact hunter named Lena, granddaughter of one of the last survivors of the cataclysm. Along with your roda (group) of hunters, you'll venture into cities to recover relics from the old world. However, after facing an unexpected crossroad, you end up trapped in one of the only cities which no hunter has ever returned: Rio de Janeiro. 
 
You will explore the ruins of Rio, discovering the memories of a city that holds many scars, even before the disaster - scars that may help unravel the mistery behind the event that changed humanity's destiny forever: the Terra Pulse.
summary: Terra Pulse is a metroidvania set in the ruins of a futuristic Rio de Janeiro.
